articles.description: Acer Predator Helios 500 (PH517-52) was launched in India on Monday. The new Acer laptop comes with a 120Hz mini LED display and an 11th-generation Intel Core i9 processor.
articles.content: Acer Predator Helios 500 (PH517-52) was launched in India on Monday. The laptop comes with an 11th-generation Intel Core i9 and features a 120Hz mini-LED display. It also carries Thunderbolt 4 ports … [+2615 chars]
